```{r}
summary(XSptsNDVI)
```
```{r}
print(XSptsNDVI)
```


```{r}
ggplot(XSptsNDVI, aes(vegetation)) + geom_bar()
```

```{r}
Xsptspheno <- XSptsNDVI %>%
  filter(vegetation != "pine") %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("NDVI"),
               names_to = "phenology",
               values_to = "NDVI") %>%

  mutate(phenology = str_sub(phenology, 5 , str_length(phenology)))
print(Xsptspheno)
```
```{r}
Xsptspheno %>%
  ggplot(aes(NDVI)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.05)
```
